page.title: 06POPULATION MOVEMENT
page.content: The{largest group}regarding population movement in Banchory-Devenick is the people who have{come into the area}in recent years. The{smallest group}is made up of{those who go out}of the communtiy. The reason why people move in is because mostly they, or their husband, work in the Oil Business or some{oil-related industry. Because Banchory-Devenick is near the city of Aberdeen many people can easily drive to work and enjoy city life while having the peace of the country at home. In the old days people left to look for work elsewhere. Now the in-comers leave if they are transferred, but many people settle here.
